solution_line_template: On Sunday {friday_turned_yellow} x 2 = <<{friday_turned_yellow}*2={sunday_turned_yellow}>>{sunday_turned_yellow} papayas turned yellow.
A total of {friday_turned_yellow} + {sunday_turned_yellow} = <<{friday_turned_yellow}+{sunday_turned_yellow}={total_turned_yellow}>>{total_turned_yellow} papayas turned yellow.
There are {initial_green_papayas} - {total_turned_yellow} = <<{initial_green_papayas}-{total_turned_yellow}={green_papayas_left}>>{green_papayas_left} green papayas still left on the tree.
